markdown:
#### ADVISORY: Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible. ## Articles in this section - [My GCash payment or transaction was unsuccessful but my wallet was deducted. How do I get a refund?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40995097563673-My-GCash-payment-or-transaction-was-unsuccessful-but-my-wallet-was-deducted-How-do-I-get-a-refund) - [Differences between Send Money, Bank Transfer, Cash In, Cash Out](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40136231787929-Differences-between-Send-Money-Bank-Transfer-Cash-In-Cash-Out) - [Manage your GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38037184606105-Manage-your-GCash-account) - [GCash Features for Basic vs Fully Verified Accounts](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19576345096217-GCash-Features-for-Basic-vs-Fully-Verified-Accounts) - [Get Started with GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19577792850457-Get-Started-with-GCash) - [Reach your Money Goals](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19577994564761-Reach-your-Money-Goals) - [Protect Your GCash Account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19578518834457-Protect-Your-GCash-Account) ## Promoted articles - [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account) - [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification) - [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account) Discover the features you can access with a Basic Profile and Fully Verified GCash accounts. Here’s a quick summary of the difference: | | | | --- | --- | | **Basic** | **Fully Verified** | | ✅ Pay Bills
✅ Buy Load
✅ Cash In | Features of Basic Profile, plus:
✅ Send Money
✅ Bank Transfer
✅ Pay QR
✅ Pay Online
✅ GCash Card
✅ Borrow
✅ GSave
✅ GInvest | ### **Basic Profile** With a Basic profile, you can: [**Pay Bills**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004373166-How-to-pay-bills-with-GCash) Easily settle your bills, utilities, government fees, etc through GCash. [**Buy Load**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413709634969-Buy-load-via-GCash) Purchase telco, non-telco, and broadband load directly through the app. [**Cash In**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/360001959874-Cash-In) Top up your GCash Wallet through linked accounts, bank transfers, and partner outlets ### **Fully Verified Profile** With a Fully Verified account, you have an **increased Wallet and Transaction Limit** and can enjoy more features like: [**Send Money**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/20493622503577-Send) Send money to other GCash Wallets quickly and securely [**Bank Transfer**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/35089719201689-Bank-Transfer) Easily transfer money from your GCash wallet to any local or digital bank account [**Pay QR**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/20517123700889-Pay) Make quick, contactless payments by scanning a merchant's QR code directly [**Pay Online**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/20517123700889-Pay) Complete transactions with merchants and apps online using your GCash account [**Borrow**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/20493614472729-Borrow) GCash provides three lending solutions to meet your financial needs: 1. **GCredit**: A **personal credit line** for purchases and payments within the app. 2. **GLoan**: A **cash loan** disbursed to your GCash wallet with flexible repayment. 3. [**GGives**:](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/4404775296921-GGives) A **buy-now-pay-later feature** for purchases with payments spread over time. [**GInvest**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/20495893354649-GInvest) Save and grow your money effortlessly with the GCash app by exploring: [**GSave:**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/360001959834-GSave) Choose from 4 partner banks and open a savings account with high interest and easy access all within the GCash app [**GCrypto**:](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/15635777518105-GCrypto) Buy, sell, and hold popular cryptocurrencies directly. [**GStocks**:](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/12736977790233-GStocks-PH) Invest in Philippine stocks powered by AB Capital Inc. [**GFunds**:](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004696433-GFunds) Invest in mutual funds managed by ATRAM and BPI. Related to - [gcash guide](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/search?content_tags=01H2WKWZYF1CWP7GXJ680S25Y6&utf8=%E2%9C%93 "Search results") [Previous](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38037184606105-Manage-your-GCash-account) Manage your GCash account [Next](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19577792850457-Get-Started-with-GCash) Get Started with GCash - [My GCash payment or transaction was unsuccessful but my wallet was deducted. How do I get a refund?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40995097563673-My-GCash-payment-or-transaction-was-unsuccessful-but-my-wallet-was-deducted-How-do-I-get-a-refund) - [Differences between Send Money, Bank Transfer, Cash In, Cash Out](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40136231787929-Differences-between-Send-Money-Bank-Transfer-Cash-In-Cash-Out) - [Manage your GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38037184606105-Manage-your-GCash-account) - [GCash Features for Basic vs Fully Verified Accounts](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19576345096217-GCash-Features-for-Basic-vs-Fully-Verified-Accounts) - [Get Started with GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19577792850457-Get-Started-with-GCash) - [Reach your Money Goals](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19577994564761-Reach-your-Money-Goals) - [Protect Your GCash Account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19578518834457-Protect-Your-GCash-Account) 19576345096217 Back to Top
